meta.title: Poster Viewer User Study
meta.description: What do you remember about the posters?
meta.disclaimer: You are participating in a study being performed by researchers in the MIT Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Lab. If you have questions about this resarch, please contact zoya@mit.edu. Your participation in this research is voluntary. You may decline further participation, at any time, without adverse consequences. Your anonymity is assured; the researchers who have requested your participation will not receive any personal information about you.

instructions.simple: You will now be asked some questions about the posters you viewed.
steps: You will be asked about the six posters you viewed in a random order.
For each poster, you will first be shown a thumbnail or a gif of the poster for a short time to jog your memory.
Then, you will be asked to fill out some questions about the content of the poster.
At the end, there will be a short survey about your overall experience.
